title: Hide apiKey in hbs with .env
body:
I would like to hide my google api key in node app with dotenv.

I tried like this using backtick, but no luck:

https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=${process.env.MAP_KEY}&callback=loadMap

When I put it like this, it works:

<script type="text/javascript" src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=XXX&callback=loadMap"></script>
